PC Number Date Chapter Chapter Year Bill Dept
 2024-12792024-12-05JUS
ActCriminal Code
SubjectRegulations Amending the Regulations Pre¬Åscribing Certain Firearms and Other Weapons, Components and Parts of Weapons, Accessories, Cartridge Magazines, Ammunition and Projectiles as Prohibited or Restricted
PrecisRegulations amending the REGULATIONS PRESCRIBING CERTAIN FIREARMS AND OTHER WEAPONS, COMPONENTS AND PARTS OF WEAPONS, ACCESSORIES, CARTRIDGE MAGAZINES, AMMUNITION AND PROJECTILES AS PROHIBITED, RESTRICTED OR NON-RESTRICTED in order to prescribe as prohibited 104 families of firearms, encompassing 324 unique makes and models of firearms because they have semi-automatic action with sustained rapid-fire capability (tactical/military design with large magazine capacity).
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2024-0248 Publication Date: 2024-12-18
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Regulations amending the REGULATIONS PRESCRIBING CERTAIN FIREARMS AND OTHER WEAPONS, COMPONENTS AND PARTS OF WEAPONS, ACCESSORIES, CARTRIDGE MAGAZINES, AMMUNITION AND PROJECTILES AS PROHIBITED, RESTRICTED OR NON-RESTRICTED in order to prescribe as prohibited 104 families of firearms, encompassing 324 unique makes and models of firearms because they have semi-automatic action with sustained rapid-fire capability (tactical/military design with large magazine capacity).
